Public Remarks: This versatile property is located on the Sea to Sky Highway to the east of the Village of Mt Currie. Lil'wat First Nations land surrounds the site to the north, west and south sides including the Village of Mount Currie and several other First Nations lands. The majority of the site is undeveloped and consists of mixed deciduous and coniferous forest including wetlands of marshes and shallow ponds and channels. The registered well provides some of the finest water in the world--designated as Glacial Artesian drinking water. The potential production capacity is US 500 gallons per minute.
